thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com | 6 of 289
thread.title: Kara(plegic.)

author: Kara(plegic.)
title: Kara(plegic.)
text: My initial conversation purchasing the tickets went smooth, and the tickets were e-mailed to me very timely. I was having issues printing off the tickets and kept running into barriers due to being in a wheelchair. I contacted TIcket City to see if ANYTHING could be done and I was sent a printout of the tickets. I am sooo grateful for this and the stress I was experiencing disappeared the moment the Dropkick Murphys/Interrupters tickets were in my hands. Thank you so much!!!
